availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer and wholesale flour dealer.Owners in 1859: Eliza Brown (widow of Joseph Brown, former owner) and Thomas G. Brown. Clerk: George W. Brown. Robert R. Brown is a salesman in 1859. Signed a petition in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlakes as flour inspector. Owners in 1861: Robert R. Brown and Thomas G. Brown.

ab.bibl:
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1859), 39, 40
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Maxwell & Co., 1861), 43-44.
KYR-0001-017-0163.
